text: Alister William Jack (born 7 July 1963) is a British politician. He is the Secretary of State for Scotland since 2019. He is a member of the Scottish Conservatives, he has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Dumfries and Galloway since 2017. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:UK MPs 2017–2019 Category:UK MPs 2019–2024 Category:Secretaries of State for Scotland Category:Conservative Party (UK) MPs Category:People from Dumfries Category:Politicians from Dumfries and Galloway Category:Members of the British House of Commons for Scottish constituencies
title: Alister Jack
